title: Chantal
description: A WOMAN MEN LOVED... SEDUCED... BETRAYED...BUT NEVER, NEVER FORGOTCHANTAL carries the reader back to a France rocked by the rhythms of Nazi jackboots... to young, beautiful Chantal, her innocence lost to a shameless French aristocrat and to the brutal truths of war.CHANTAL captures the danger and desperate gaiety of occupied Paris, where intrigue leads to liaisons of shame and scandal... and to an American whose life is joined with hers by a secret fate.CHANTAL exposes a glittering Hollywood whose golden promise is shattered by greed and sin... where an unforgettable woman searches for the one man whose searing flesh can touch hers--and make her whole again.
author: Yvone Lenard
